description:
PayPal is a convenient, cost-effective mobile and traditional e-commerce payment tool that lets you securely accept multiple forms of payment anywhere in the U.S. It includes a free app and card reader for your iPhone or Android device as well.

Here are benefits of enrolling in this course;
  1. Learn to easily create e-commerce payment buttons for your website
  2. Find out how to create payment invoices for customers and send them
  3. Learn to navigate the Paypal interface like a PRO in 10 minutes
  4. Learn to create multiple payment website buttons for price-point testing
  5. Discover the easiest way to increase sales using Paypal
  6. Learn to maximize every area of the Paypal system to increase profits

In this course, we teach Paypal Mobile and Paypal Traditional Payment Methods. Nothing is more important than establishing easy to use e-payment solutions to increase business revenue and profits so join today!
title: Ecommerce Website - Using Paypal
